snippet: The gallery will use the former four-story Dia Art Foundation space on West 22nd Street as a temporary home.
abstract: Hauser & Wirth gallery will occupy former Dia Art Foundation space on West 22nd Street while its new buidling is being constructed next door.
lead_paragraph: The gallery will use the former four-story Dia Art Foundation space on West 22nd Street as a temporary home.

headline.main: Hauser & Wirth Gallery to Take Over Former Dia Space in Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Hauser & Wirth Gallery Taking Former Dia Space
